original_title: Obtain permission from MOH before organizing dansals: PHI Union
original_body_lines: Those who organize dansals in view of the Vesak festival should obtain permission from the relevant Medical Officer of Health (MOH), the Public Health Inspectors’ Union said.
Its President Upul Rohana said they were required to fill out the necessary paperwork and obtain permission from the MOH.

“As we are experiencing rain after a long dry spell, there is a risk of spreading diarrhea with events like these. We urge the public to inform the MOH and obtain our help, especially with requirements such as chlorinating water,” he said.
